snippet: A scientist suing Gawker writes, “Some of the people who were getting run over — like Hulk Hogan and me — called in the law.”
lead_paragraph: A scientist suing Gawker writes, “Some of the people who were getting run over — like Hulk Hogan and me — called in the law.”

headline.print_headline: Issues Raised by the Lawsuits Against Gawker
